responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "C1F6F69D4BF04720FE93DF9A85C1FFF8", "Entry #57 It\'s been nearly two months since we\'ve lost contact. We hadn\'t accounted for our supplies being stolen, and we\'re now down to our last third. Petra has taken charge on refocusing our efforts. He\'s optimistic about living off the resources here, but Hedron thinks otherwise. While we could steal back what the goblins owe, we haven\'t been successful so far in persuading the creatures to keep away. I have to find a way to prevent this difference of opinion from dividing the crew.")
name: CSQ_RVR_0084_FB_MercilessGeneral_Logbook_DLG_4_Response
